statements: DELETE FROM chat_log WHERE message LIKE '%spam%' AND player_id = '98765432-ABCD-ABCD-ABCD-ABCDEFABCDEF';
DELETE FROM chat_log WHERE player_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 100 OR (player_id = 2 AND interaction_time > '2022-03-01');
DELETE FROM chat_log WHERE player_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'chat';
DELETE FROM chat_log WHERE log_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM chat_log WHERE interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND player_id = 500;
DELETE FROM interaction WHERE player_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 5678 AND quantity < 5;
